name: Avvo,Inc.
overview: Avvo, Inc. operates as an online health and legal directory that rates and profiles doctors and lawyers in the United States. The company enables consumers to handle medical and legal matters, as well as offers a question-and-answer forum that allows consumers to ask legal or health related questions and receive answers from rated lawyers and doctors. It offers ratings and profiles of the practicing lawyers and doctors, as well as client and patient reviews, peer endorsements, professional disciplinary records, professional’s background, and contact information. The company also provides Avvo Ignite, a client conversion and Website solution for attorneys. Avvo, Inc. was founded in 2006 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

relationships.title: Co-Founder, Board Member and VP Products/Marketing
